Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: Goldenrod Avenue continues east and west through the village.
Room.LongDescription: You are walking along a narrow road between the village wall and the open back doors of several shops. The shop entrances are actually on another alley to the south. Looks like a lot of garbage gets thrown out along this alley, judging from the stink and the piles of fresh refuse. Alley cats and dirty little kids fight each other for anything edible.
